# WOC - Doppler currents

<br>

This dataset contains calibrated Sentinel-1 IW SAR Doppler frequency shift and waves bias estimates required for retrieving ocean surface current radial velocity, combined with wind from ECMWF and Stokes drift.
 
**More information on the Doppler products [here](https://www.worldoceancirculation.org/Products#/metadata/eb10fc04-0d51-42b5-8788-f9b40130c2a1) !**
 

<br>
